price: Мўминларки, ўзларига зулм етса, улар ғолиб бўлурлар.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
